synopsis.text: This anime special, titled "A Town Where You Live," offers a nostalgic journey into the past and a satisfying conclusion to the beloved manga series. The first part, adapted from the popular flashback chapter 'Uchi ga Kita Machi,' unveils the heartwarming childhood encounter of Haruto, Akari, and Takashi, serving as a charming prelude to the TV anime. This special chapter, originally featured in the manga's ninth volume, is brought to life in the limited-edition 26th manga volume. The second part, included in the 27th and final limited-edition manga volume, is a unique OVA episode, meticulously crafted with the full cooperation of Seo Kouji. This episode animates the poignant end of the manga, making it a must-watch for fans seeking closure to the long-running series.
